maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Vagabond

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: Seeker, are you ready to face your final trial?
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], êtes-vous prête pour votre dernière épreuve ?
[acquiesce]
Si telle est votre volonté...

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: Seeker... It's time for a duel.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: \v[lore.title.seeker]... Le temps est venu pour un duel.
[Secoue la Tête]
Si telle est votre volonté...
Restez toujours vigilant, \v[lore.title.seeker].
Oui
Non
Vagabond

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: You have earned the Mark of Mastery and with it, the \c[3]Meteor Shade\c[0]!
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Vous avez atteint la véritable perfection et pour cela, méritez le \c[3]Symbole de la Météorite\c[0] !

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: Now walk through the door behind me and speak to the ones that came before to receive your prize.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Maintenant passez la porte derrière moi et parlez à ceux qui sont venus avant vous pour recevoir votre prix.
Vagabond
Le \c[3]Symbole de la Météorite\c[0] est à vous, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: We are impressed. Very much so.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Nous sommes impressionnés, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Très impressionnés.

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: My Brothers and Sisters speak highly of the Seeker that defeated the Twilight.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Mes Frères et Sœurs parlent avec respect du \v[lore.title.seeker] qui a vaincu le Maitre de la Pénombre.

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: One even mentioned preparing an old trial.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: L'un d'entre eux a même parlé de préparer une ancienne épreuve.

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: Meet her at the \c[3]Nesting Grounds\c[0] where you completed the Trial of Vigor.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Rencontrez-la aux \c[3]Terres de Pontes\c[0] où vous avez terminé l'Épreuve de Vigueur.
[acquiesce]
Restez toujours vigilant, \v[lore.title.seeker].
... Salut ?
... Préparez-vous...
... Montrez-nous ce que vous avez appris...
Battez les Scarabées !
Vagabond
Félicitations, \v[lore.title.seeker].
... Salut ?!
Vagabond

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: It seems nothing can faze you. Maybe you are indeed ready.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Il semblerait que rien ne vous déstabilise. Peut-être que vous êtes réellement prête.

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: You have mastered every trial put in front of you.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Vous avez réussi toutes les épreuves que nous avons placés sur votre chemin.

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: The golden beetles are proof of that.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Les Scarabées d'Or en sont une preuve.
Vagabond

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: And you survived our little surprise.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Et vous avez survécu à notre petite surprise.

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: But this was not your last trial, oh no.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Mais cela n'était pas votre dernière épreuve, oh non.

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: In your last trial you will face the \c[3]guardian of this place\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Dans votre dernière épreuve vous \c[3]affronterez le gardien de cet endroit\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: Speak to me if you wish to start this final test.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Parlez-moi si vous souhaitez démarrer cette épreuve finale.
Vagabond

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: That I would see the day a Seeker would best me in combat...
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Qu'un jour viendrait où un \v[lore.title.seeker] prévaudrait contre moi au combat...

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: It was a good fight. One you can be proud of.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: C'était un bon combat. Un dont vous pouvez être fière.

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: You have earned the Mark of Mastery and with it, the \c[3]Meteor Shade\c[0]!
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Vous avez atteint la véritable perfection et pour cela, méritez le \c[3]Symbole de la Météorite\c[0] !

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: Now walk through the door behind me and speak to the ones that came before to receive your prize.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Maintenant passez la porte derrière moi et parlez à ceux qui sont venus avant vous pour recevoir votre prix.

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: Noooooo!\. It's instanced!\. I don't want to do this myself!!
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Noooon !\. C'est instancié !\. Je ne veux pas faire ça toute seule !!

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: Good luck with the final trial, Spheromancer Lea!
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Bonne chance pour l'épreuve finale, Spheromanceuse Lea !

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: Oh it's instanced. I guess we're on our own for the final trial.
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Oh, c'est instancié. J'imagine que l'on est chacun tout seul pour l'épreuve finale.

maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.orig: Huh. It's instanced. Good luck, Lea!
maps/forest/interior/dojo-boss.json/enti.text: Mmmm. C'est instancié. Bonne chance, Lea !

maps/forest/interior/expo-space.json/ent.orig:
Your journey brought you to this
forest of the eternal night.
maps/forest/interior/expo-space.json/ent.text:
Votre voyage vous a mené dans cette
forêt de la nuit éternelle.

maps/forest/interior/expo-space.json/ent.orig:
Taking on the trials given 
by the creatures of these lands.
maps/forest/interior/expo-space.json/ent.text:
Affrontant les épreuves données
par les créatures de ces terres.

maps/forest/interior/expo-space.json/ent.orig:
You proved your vigor, your patience,
your agility, your insight.
maps/forest/interior/expo-space.json/ent.text:
Vous avez prouvé votre vigueur, votre patience,
votre agilité, votre perspicacité.

maps/forest/interior/expo-space.json/ent.orig:
All the virtues to be held
by a true envoy of change.
maps/forest/interior/expo-space.json/ent.text:
Toutes les vertus qu'un véritable
émissaire du changement doit posséder.

maps/forest/interior/expo-space.json/ent.orig:
Take this Shade to open 
the path through the northern caves.
maps/forest/interior/expo-space.json/ent.text:
Prenez ce Symbole pour ouvrir
le chemin vers les caves du nord.

maps/forest/interior/expo-space.json/ent.orig:
Let your every step
form the path of your growth.
maps/forest/interior/expo-space.json/ent.text:
Que chacun de vos pas
dessine le chemin de votre croissance.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Spheromancer Lea! Congratulations on passing the final trial.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Spheromanceuse Lea ! Félicitations pour avoir réussi l'épreuve finale.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: HOW?!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: COMMENT ?!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Do you wonder I got first despite your \c[1]clear advantage of dealing bugged damage\c[0]?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Tu te demandes peut-être comment je suis arrivé premier malgré ton \c[1]avantage certain de causer des dégâts bogués\c[0] ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Well, that's something only a \c[1]seasoned Spheromancer\c[0] can understand!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Eh bien, c'est seulement quelque chose que seul un \c[1]Spheromanceur expérimenté\c[0] peut comprendre !
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.note: dit plutôt que t'as déjà fini le boss hier

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Lea!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Lea !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: And as expected, both Spheromancers passed first!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Et, comme l'on s'y attendait, les deux Spheromanceurs sont arrivés en premier !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Spheromancer Lea, what a coincidence! It looks like we both just passed the final trial!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Spheromanceuse Lea, quelle coïncidence ! On dirait que nous venons tous les deux de réussir l'épreuve finale !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Lea!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Lea !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Phew! That was quite troublesome!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Pfiou ! C'était assez ardu !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: All that sword fighting is hard to handle for a mage class.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Contre un combattant à l'épée, une classe de mage n'est pas vraiment à son avantage.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oh! I see Apollo is here as well?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Oh ! Apollo est là aussi, à ce que je vois ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oh! Lea... and Apollo?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Oh ! Lea... et Apollo ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Did you two just finish the quest as well?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Vous aussi vous venez de finir la quête ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Pretty much, Hexacast!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Effectivement, Hexacast !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Nice! I just barely managed.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Super ! Moi j'ai à peine réussi.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: You know...\. a mage versus a samurai...\. you can imagine how that goes.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Vous savez...\. un mage contre un samurai...\. vous pouvez deviner comment ça se passe.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Phew, that guy sure was fast.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Pfiou, ce type était rapide.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Polly! You're here, too? And here I thought you finished that quest already.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Polly ! Tu es là, toi aussi ? Et moi qui pensais que tu avais déjà fini cette quête.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oh, more company appeared.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Oh, encore de la compagnie.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Hello!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Bonjour !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Salut !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Lea! You're here as well?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Lea ! Tu es là toi aussi ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: We just keep running into each other...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: On passe notre temps à se croiser...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Ah I see. You've been doing that quest with Lea, Polly?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Ah, je vois. Tu étais en train de faire cette quête avec Lea, Polly ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Uhm... I thought you were busy today?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Euh... Je croyais que tu étais occupé aujourd'hui ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Bug...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Scarabée...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Bug...\.\. Samurai....
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Scarabée...\.\.\. Samurai...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Bug...\.\. Samurai...\.\. Boss...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Boss...\.\. Scarabée...\.\.\. Samurai...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Or...\. was he just a Samurai?\. I'm not sure...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Ou...\. est-ce que c'était juste un Samurai ?\. Je ne suis pas sûre...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Maybe his armor just made him kinda... look like a bug?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Peut-être que son armure le fait... ressembler à un scarabée ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Well actually...\. traditional samurai armor is already bug-inspired,\. so...\.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Eh bien, en fait... Les armures samurai traditionnelles sont déjà inspirés des scarabées,\. donc...\.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Shut up, nerd.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Tais-toi, intello.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Wait, what's everyone doing here?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Attends, qu'est-ce que tout le monde fait ici ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Did we all just pass this quest at the same time?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: On a tous réussi la quête en même temps ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Looks like it!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: On dirait que oui !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Talk about coincidence!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Tu parles d'une coïncidence !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oh well...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Eh bien...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: That certainly was the worst quest ever!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: C'était vraiment la pire des quêtes !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: And it's DONE!\. Done and over with!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Et c'est TERMINÉ !\. Terminé, et derrière nous !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Congratulations, Pentafist!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Félicitations, Pentafist !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Now, the time has come to collect our reward!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Maintenant, le temps est venu de récupérer notre récompense !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oui, oui. Let's go!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Oui, oui. Allons-y !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Uhm...\. did we just...\. complete the game?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Euh...\. est-ce qu'on vient...\. de terminer le jeu ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Sort of.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Plus ou moins.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: We completed the track and now can enter \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Nous avons atteint la fin du tracé et maintenant nous pouvons entrer dans \c[3]\v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: It means we reached the \c[3]end game\c[0]!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Cela signifie que nous avons atteint la \c[3]fin du jeu\c[0] !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Wha...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Quo...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: I was expecting another dungeon!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Je m'attendais à un autre donjon !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Yes... and Instatainment is working on it apparently.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Oui... et Instatainment travaille apparemment là-dessus.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: People are hoping for an update that will complete the Track.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Les gens espèrent qu'une mise à jour complètera le Tracé.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: So... you're telling me CrossWorlds is still in \c[3]early access\c[0]?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Donc... tu veux me dire que CrossWorlds est toujours en \c[3]accès anticipé\c[0] ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Mon dieu...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Mon dieu...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Complete gaming experiences really have become rare these days.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Les jeux entièrement terminés sont devenus rares ces derniers temps.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: You know, at least it's all coherent with the lore.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Tu sais, au moins, c'est cohérent avec l'histoire.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Humankind simply has yet to unlock the final part of the track.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: L'humanité n'a juste pas encore déverrouillé la dernière partie du tracé.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: And it will happen if enough Seekers run the track.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Et cela arrivera si suffisamment de \v[lore.title.seeker]s suivent le tracé.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oui, oui.\. That's very convenient.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Oui, oui.\. C'est un peu trop facile.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Wait...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Attends...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Lea, that means Grand Krys'kajo was pretty much our last dungeon race, non?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Lea, ça veut dire que le \v[area.tree-dng.name] était comme qui dirait notre dernière course au donjon, non ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: So not counting that tutorial dungeon, we had 5 runs in total.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Donc sans compter le donjon du tutoriel, nous avons eu 5 courses au total.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: And the final score of Lea versus Emilie is...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Et le score final de Lea contre Emilie est de...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: \v[plot.race.leaWins] to \v[plot.race.emilieWins].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: \v[plot.race.leaWins] à \v[plot.race.emilieWins].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Man, you really had the upper hand, didn't you?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Eh ben, tu as vraiment pris le dessus, pas vrai ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: And here I thought I'd have a chance after I won the tutorial dungeon.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Et moi qui pensais que j'aurais eu une chance après avoir gagné au donjon du tutoriel.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: \v[plot.race.leaWins] to \v[plot.race.emilieWins].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: \v[plot.race.leaWins] à \v[plot.race.emilieWins].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oui, oui! Pentafists are known for speed, non?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Oui, oui ! Les Pentafists sont connus pour leur rapidité, non ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Still, you've been an honorable opponent, Lea!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Mais tu étais une adversaire honorable, Lea !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: \v[plot.race.leaWins] to \v[plot.race.emilieWins].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: \v[plot.race.leaWins] à \v[plot.race.emilieWins].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: That's surprisingly balanced, non?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: C'est assez équilibré, non ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Well... it certainly was a lot of fun to do those races!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Bon... c'était vraiment fun de faire ces courses.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Let's continue once new dungeons are added!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Tu sais quoi ? On continuera cette course dès que d'autres donjons sortiront !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: So... anyone want to check out Rhombus Square?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Donc... quelqu'un a envie de visiter \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name] ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Sure, why not! Where do we have to go?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Bien sûr, pourquoi pas ! Où est-ce qu'il faut aller ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Back to \c[3]CrossCentral\c[0], then take the \c[3]south exit\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Il faut retourner au \c[3]CrossCentral\c[0], puis prendre la \c[3]sortie sud\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Très bien!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Très bien !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: I honestly just want to get out of this bug infested place, so I'll go ahead!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: J'ai vraiment très envie de partir de cet endroit infesté d'insectes, donc je vais partir devant !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Let's meet at CrossCentral!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Rencontrons-nous au CrossCentral !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Sounds like a plan.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Bonne idée.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Alright!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: OK !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: We did it Lea! We got the last Shade!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: On a réussi, Lea ! On a le dernier Symbole !

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: That means we can also access the northern part of \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Ça veut dire qu'on peut atteindre la partie nord de la \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Hopefully we will find the place in your dreams somewhere in that area.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Avec de la chance on trouvera le lieu que tu as vu dans tes rêves quelque part là-bas.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: After all, we are running out of options.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Après tout, il nous reste plus beaucoup de possibilités.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Of course... if you like you can join the others and explore Rhombus Square first.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Mais bien sûr... si tu veux tu peux rejoindre les autres et explorer \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name] avant.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Finding Satoshi's hideout can wait a little bit longer.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Trouver la cachette de Satoshi peut attendre un peu plus longtemps.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Join the others to explore \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0] or search the north of \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Rejoignez les autres pour explorer \c[3]\v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]\c[0] ou cherchez au nord de la \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: This...\. is nice.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: C'est...\. cool.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: No heights to be afraid of, huh?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Aucune hauteur dont tu peux avoir peur, hein ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Yes...\. I needed this...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Oui...\. C'est vraiment ce dont j'avais besoin...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: That last tree dungeon was...\. the literal pinnacle.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Ce dernier donjon de l'arbre...\. c'était vraiment le pompon.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: No new lore this time, huh?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Pas de nouveau folklore cette fois, hein ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Nope, not yet at least...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Non, où du moins, pas encore...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: You think they're ever gonna add more?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Tu penses qu'ils en rajouteront plus tard ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: I'm like\.\.\. 80% sure they're gonna add more with the next big update.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Je suis, genre\.\.\. sûr à 80 % qu'ils en ajouteront plus à la prochaine grosse M.a.j.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: What's the ETA on it?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Et elle sortira quand, à peu près ?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: TBA.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: On sait pas.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Figures...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Bien sûr...
